application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
B1 3 x birch trees to crown reduce by 2-2.5m	
T4 Large chestnut tree to crown reduce by 2-2.5m	
G2
Self seeded cherry to fell and poison	
Small acacia to fell 	
To reduce elm tree by 2-2.5m	
To reduce multi stemmed elm tree by 2-2.5m
To reduce sycamore tree by 2-2.5m	
To reduce large sycamore by 2-2.5m
To reduce twin stemmed sycamore by 2-2.5m
To reduce sycamore by 2-2.5m
To reduce ivy covered sycamore by 2-2.5m and sever ivy	
To reduce 3 x elm trees by 2-2.5m	
To fell dead plum tree 	
Front
T12 To reduce sycamore by 2-2.5m and remove deadwood 	
T16 Acacia to crown lift to 6m	
A1 Group of elms, sycamores and acacias, we recommend reduce all larger trees by 2-2.5mand raising crowns and to fell smaller trees
decision_conditions: It is recommended that the following tree works can be completed  as below, as identified on Haverings TPO plan 5/98 can be pruned as in the following schedule.
Group G2, to the rear of Catiline Court.
To reduce elm tree by 2-2.5m
To reduce multi stemmed elm tree by 2-2.5m
To reduce sycamore tree by 2-2.5m
To reduce large sycamore by 2-2.5m
To reduce twin stemmed sycamore by 2-2.5m
To reduce sycamore by 2-2.5m
To reduce ivy covered sycamore by 2-2.5mand sever ivy
To reduce 3 x elm trees by 2-2.5m
T4 Large chestnut tree to crown reduce by 2-2.5m
Front
T12 To reduce sycamore by 2-2.5m and remove deadwood
T16 Acacia to crown lift to 6m.

The trees below are not covered by the existing TPO 5/98, but are situated within the grounds of Catiline Court which is within the Gidea Park Conservation Area, the six week evaluation period has expired, and the Arboricultural Officer has reviewed this request for these works and does not consider that these tree's meet the criteria for protecting
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out to the standards detailed in British Standard Document BS 3998:2010.
Reason:
To ensure that the work is carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.
The work for which consent is granted shall be carried out within 2 years from the date of this consent.
Reason:
To prevent the accumulation of consents.
